definition: a casual meeting with a person or thing, contend against an opponent in a sport, game, or battle
details:
noun
- a casual meeting with a person or thing
= synonyms: coming upon
- a minor short-term fight
= synonyms: brush
- a hostile disagreement face-to-face
= synonyms: face-off, confrontation, showdown
- a casual or unexpected convergence
= synonyms: meeting
verb
- contend against an opponent in a sport, game, or battle
= synonyms: play
- come together
= synonyms: meet, see, come across, run into, run across
- come upon, as if by accident
= synonyms: find
- be beset by
= synonyms: run into
- experience as a reaction
= synonyms: meet, receive
